channel.title: Why does this allways happen?
channel.description:
O.K. I finally get a working server and client then try to log into it. This shows up when I try to log in through the client.
Your Server v3 is now online. Connection from Darryl-PC.gateway.2wire.net:60714 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8249) at client.run(client.java:16668) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (Darryl-PC.gateway.2wire.net) Connection from Darryl-PC.gateway.2wire.net:60714 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8249) at client.run(client.java:16668) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (Darryl-PC.gateway.2wire.net) Connection from Darryl-PC.gateway.2wire.net:60714 Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:168) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8249) at client.run(client.java:16668) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (Darryl-PC.gateway.2wire.net)
What do I do and can somebody please help! I would give someone rep if they would get on Teamviewer and help me get a server going on Silabsoft. Thanks for viewing and helping! Tyler

item.title: Why does this allways happen?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

sounds like the client isnt letting you login to it you mite just have to find a beter client
